item.title: 世界银行称石油资源丰富的南苏丹经济将萎缩 30
item.description: 据世界银行称，南苏丹的经济在截至 6 月的财政年度将萎缩约 30%，但在恢复石油出口后可能会反弹。【原文：South Sudan’s economy will contract by about 30% in the fiscal year ending June, but could rebound after the resumption of oil exports, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 德意志银行认为商业地产面临更多不利因素
item.description: 德意志银行预计，商业地产市场将继续面临不利因素，其中美国的弱点尤为明显，那里的租赁活动放缓，空置率高于欧洲。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG expects headwinds to continue in commercial real estate markets, with weaknesses especially pronounced in the US where leasing activity is slower and vacancy rates are higher than in Europe.】

item.title: 美国制裁伊朗石油部长和影子舰队
item.description: 特朗普政府正在对伊朗石油部长实施制裁，并针对更多与德黑兰用来规避制裁的 "影子船队 "有关的公司和船只。【原文：The Trump administration is imposing sanctions on Iran’s oil minister, as well as targeting more companies and vessels linked to the “shadow fleet” that Tehran uses to circumvent sanctions.】

item.title: 关税风险加剧，美国股市徘徊于调整区域附近
item.description: 由于对贸易战经济影响的担忧抵消了对美国 2 月份批发通胀停滞数据的乐观情绪，周三美股的反弹被证明是暂时的。【原文：A bounce in US stocks on Wednesday proved temporary, as anxiety about the economic impact of a trade war offset optimism over data showing US wholesale inflation stagnated in February.】

item.title: 意大利 IBL 银行关注联合信贷银行和意大利联合信贷银行安排的 SRT 交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，意大利 IBL Banca SpA 公司正在评估投资者对与工资抵押贷款组合相关的重大风险转移的兴趣。【原文：Italy’s IBL Banca SpA is assessing investors’ interest for a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of salary-backed loans, according to people familiar to the matter.】

item.title: 标准银行认为南非联盟将渡过预算风波
item.description: 标准银行集团有限公司（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）首席执行官西姆-查巴拉拉（Sim Tshabalala）表示，尽管南非执政联盟的合作伙伴在第一份预算案上存在分歧，但联盟不太可能分裂。标准银行集团有限公司首席执行官西姆-查巴拉拉（Sim Tshabalala）说。【原文：South Africa’s ruling coalition is unlikely to splinter despite differences between the partners over its first budget, Standard Bank Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Sim Tshabalala said.】

item.title: 美国的反对意味着七国集团将再次面临无联合声明的前景
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，七国集团面临着再次无法就联合声明达成一致的前景，即使在公报草案被大幅缩水之后也是如此。【原文：The Group of Seven faces the prospect of failing to agree to a joint statement again, even after the draft of the communique was significantly watered down, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳政府搁置钻石贸易商交易
item.description: 博茨瓦纳收购比利时宝石贸易商 HB Antwerp 股份的交易（由上届政府提出，但从未完成）似乎陷入了僵局。【原文：Botswana’s deal to acquire a stake in Belgian gem trader HB Antwerp — proposed by the previous government but never completed — appears to be in limbo.】

item.title: 英国家庭四月面临 600 英镑的打击，因为账单将上涨
item.description: 对于英国家庭来说，四月将是最残酷的一个月。【原文：April is shaping up to be the cruelest month for British households.】

item.title: iPhone 16e 评测：苹果入门级手机受制于昂贵的价格
item.description:
苹果在没有明确市场的情况下推出了新款 iPhone

【原文：

Apple created a new iPhone without a clear market

】

item.title: 沃伦呼吁对特斯拉白宫活动进行道德调查
item.description: 由伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）领导的一个民主党参议员团体呼吁对白宫宣传特斯拉公司的活动进行道德调查。【原文：A group of Democratic senators led by Elizabeth Warren is calling for an ethics investigation into a White House event promoting Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备创 2021 年以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 受印度储备银行上个月货币互换操作的推动，印度的美元库存创下了三年多来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：India’s dollar stockpile had its biggest weekly gain in over three years, bolstered by the Reserve Bank of India’s currency swap operations last month.】

item.title: 诺和诺德怀疑论者在股价从顶峰回落后终于上调股票评级
item.description: 一位长期怀疑诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的人士建议买入这家丹麦减肥药生产商的股票。【原文：A long-term Novo Nordisk A/S skeptic recommended buying shares of the Danish weight-loss drug maker nine years after starting coverage of the stock.】

item.title: 投资者透过数据看关税风险，美国国债下跌
item.description: 国债连续第三天扩大跌幅，原因是围绕特朗普政府贸易政策迫在眉睫的影响所产生的忧虑盖过了疲软的生产者价格通胀。【原文：Treasuries extended losses for a third day as angst surrounding the looming impact of the Trump administration’s trade policy overshadows soft producer price inflation.】

item.title: 推动驱逐出境为华尔街债务机器埋下隐患
item.description: 马塞洛-罗德里格斯（Marcelo Rodriguez）是连接华尔街和纽约西班牙语社区的贷款链条的中间人，他为包括无证件者在内的弱势借款人提供了一条生命线。现在，这条生命线开始岌岌可危。【原文：Marcelo Rodriguez is in the middle of a chain of lending that has connected Wall Street to New York’s Spanish-speaking community, providing a lifeline to vulnerable borrowers including the undocumented. That lifeline is now starting to fray.】

item.title: 人工智能公司拥抱在更少的芯片上运行的高效模型
item.description: 中国 DeepSeek 的病毒式成功引发了科技公司对人工智能系统开发成本的反思，将近两个月后，一些领先的人工智能公司开始采用 "少即是多 "的方法。【原文：Nearly two months after the viral success of China’s DeepSeek prompted a reckoning over how much tech companies spend to develop artificial intelligence systems, some leading AI firms are embracing a less-is-more approach.】

item.title: 各方反对增税，南非考虑修改预算
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）可能不得不修改国家预算，因为控制议会半数以上席位的政党否决了他的增税计划。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana may have to make changes to the national budget after parties that control more than half the seats in parliament rejected his plans to raise taxes.】

item.title: 前员工因职业生涯受挫起诉德意志银行，索赔 1.65 亿美元
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）被一名前雇员起诉，要求赔偿约 1.52 亿欧元（1.65 亿美元）的损失，因为他声称在意大利与 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 有关的刑事诉讼对其职业生涯造成了损害。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG was sued by a former employee seeking around €152 million ($165 million) in damages for alleged harm caused to his career by criminal proceedings in Italy related to Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA.】

item.title: 股息令人失望，KCB 股价创 18 年最大跌幅
item.description: 肯尼亚资产规模最大的银行肯尼亚商业银行集团（KCB Group Plc）宣布派发低于预期的股息后，其股价创下 18 年来最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of KCB Group Plc plunged the most in 18 years after Kenya’s biggest bank by assets declared a lower-than-expected dividend.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称赞英国和墨西哥，抨击加拿大的贸易报复行为
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）赞扬了英国和墨西哥避免与美国针锋相对地提高关税，并警告说，那些对美国的保护主义措施做出反应而惹恼唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易伙伴将面临严厉的反击。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick praised the UK and Mexico for refraining from engaging in tit-for-tat tariff hikes with the US, warning that those trading partners that upset President Donald Trump with their responses to American protectionist steps open themselves to a severe reaction.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚与其他国家一道呼吁欧盟推迟建立新的燃料碳市场
item.description: 爱沙尼亚与欧盟其他国家一道，敦促欧盟推迟甚至取消针对运输和取暖燃料的新碳市场，因为人们担心这会提高能源成本。【原文：Estonia joined other European Union nations in urging the bloc to delay or even scrap a new carbon market for transportation and heating fuels, on concerns it could boost energy costs.】

item.title: 美元跌势暂缓，交易商利用期权押注反弹
item.description: 在经历了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）首次担任美国总统以来最糟糕的开局之后，交易员们对美元的看法似乎变得更加乐观。【原文：Traders look to be turning more optimistic on the dollar after its worst start to the year since Donald Trump’s first term as US President.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数略有下降，仍接近创纪录前水平
item.description: 上周美国失业救济金申请人数变化不大，与大流行前的水平基本持平。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits were little changed last week, remaining roughly in line with pre-pandemic levels.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格指数因服务成本下降而停滞不前
item.description: 美国 2 月份的批发通胀停滞不前，这得益于服务成本的下降，并表明在特朗普政府征收额外关税之前，物价有所松动。【原文：US wholesale inflation stagnated in February, helped by a decline in services costs and pointing to some relief on prices before additional tariffs were imposed by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 共和党人敦促美联储修改补充杠杆率
item.description: 五位众议院共和党人敦促美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔采取措施改善国债市场的流动性，包括考虑 "有针对性地 "修改银行资本要求。【原文：Five House Republicans urged Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to take steps to improve liquidity in the Treasury securities market, including considering “targeted” changes to bank capital requirements.】

item.title: 石油生产峰值的阴影再次笼罩
item.description:
在本周于休斯顿举行的 CERAWeek 会议上，该主题占据了显著位置。【原文：

The topic has featured prominently at this week’s CERAWeek conference in Houston.

】

item.title: 雨果博斯预计年初美国和中国市场需求低迷
item.description: 雨果博斯公司（Hugo Boss AG）今年恢复利润增长的计划面临初步障碍，因为美国和中国消费者情绪疲软，影响了本季度的销售和利润。【原文：Hugo Boss AG’s plan to return to profit growth this year faces an initial hurdle as weak consumer sentiment in the US and China weigh on sales and profit in the current quarter.】

item.title: 加拿大汽车零部件股因关税问题陷入困境
item.description: 随着北美汽车制造业陷入停滞的可能性增大，加拿大最大的汽车零部件企业在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁重压下举步维艰。这使得股价急速回落，跌至科维德-19 大流行时期的水平。【原文：Canada’s biggest auto parts names are buckling under the weight of US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats as the chances the North American car manufacturing industry will stall grow. That’s sending stock prices hurtling back down toward levels last seen during the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 德意志银行将汽车业贷款列为日益增长的风险
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）警告说，欧洲充满挑战的经济环境、向电动汽车的过渡以及来自中国的竞争，正在给其汽车行业贷款带来越来越大的风险。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG warned that a challenging economic environment in Europe, the transition to electric vehicles and competition from China are posing a growing risk to its loans to the automotive sector.】
